com.nexmo.sdk.util

Class DeviceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.sdk.util.DeviceUtil

  • public class DeviceUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for getting the handset properties. Used to check whether the handset uses a SIM card, or it is WiiFi only.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String TAG
      Log tag.

    • Method Detail

      • getCountryCode

        public static java.lang.String getCountryCode(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the ISO country code equivalent for the SIM provider's country code.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the sender activity.
        Returns:
        The country code of the current SIM card, null if the context supplied was null.

      • isNumberMatchingSIMCard

        public static boolean isNumberMatchingSIMCard(android.content.Context context,
                              java.lang.String countryCode,
                              java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Check if the provided SIM details match the internal SIM card.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the sender activity.
        countryCode - The supplied country code.
        phoneNumber - The supplied phone number.
        Returns:
        True if the supplied SIM details match the SIM card, False otherwise.

      • getPhoneNumber

        public static java.lang.String getPhoneNumber(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the phone number for the SIM line 1.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the sender activity.
        Returns:
        The phone number, or null if it is unavailable.

      • isSIMAvailable

        public static boolean isSIMAvailable(android.content.Context context)
        Checks if the current handset uses a SIM card.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the sender activity.
        Returns:
        True if the handset uses a SIM card, False if the handset has no SIM or it is WifiOnly.

      • isPhoneDualSIM

        public static boolean isPhoneDualSIM(android.content.Context context)
        Check if there are 2 SIM cards available on the handset.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the sender activity.
        Returns:
        True if the handset if dualSim, false otherwise.

      • isNetworkAvailable

        public static boolean isNetworkAvailable(android.content.Context context)
        Indicates whether a network connectivity exists and if it is possible to establish connections and pass data.

        This method does not provide notifications in case the connectivity changes, so make sure you call this each time before attempting to send requests.

        Parameters:
        context - The context of the sender activity.
        Returns:
        true if network connectivity exists, false otherwise.
